days.text: Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Light rain at first. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy. Periods of rain. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Cloudy. A few rain patches. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
